snippet: Many who went to the Executive Mansion on the anniversary of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s inauguration said their high expectations had been fulfilled.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo opens doors of governor's mansion in Albany to the public on New Year's Day; visitors offer praise for Cuomo's handling of his first year in office.
lead_paragraph: Many who went to the Executive Mansion on the anniversary of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s inauguration said their high expectations had been fulfilled.

headline.seo: Cuomo Receives Praise From Visitors at Governor’s Mansion
headline.main: At Open House, Visitors Bear Praise for Governor
headline.print_headline: At Governor’s Mansion, Visitors Bearing Praise
